name: part_003
file: tmp_大神ミオ４周年記念ライブ - Mio Forest night party - [0WLlmgirGD8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Ookami Mio and Amane Kanata performing 'Ghost Rule'.
Instrumental transition as Takane Lui and AZKi join Ookami Mio on stage.
Ookami Mio, Takane Lui, and AZKi performing 'Shijou Shugi Ad Truck'.

subtitles.original: ピエロだ
subtitles.english: I'm a clown.

subtitles.original: メーデー 僕とわかっても もう抱きしめなくていいんだよ
subtitles.english: Mayday, even if you realize it's me, you don't have to hold me anymore.

subtitles.original: メーデー 僕がわかったら もう一度笑ってくれるかな
subtitles.english: Mayday, if you understand me, will you smile for me once more?

subtitles.original: メーデー 僕を叱ってよ 正直者が夢見たいなら
subtitles.english: Mayday, scold me, if the honest person wants to dream.

subtitles.original: メーデー 僕を裁いてよ 最後まで甘えてしまうのは
subtitles.english: Mayday, judge me, for relying on you until the very end.

subtitles.original: メーデー 僕を暴いてよ もう直き終わるこの世界から
subtitles.english: Mayday, expose me, from this world that is about to end.

subtitles.original: メーデー 僕と踊ってよ 最初からいないとわかってた
subtitles.english: Mayday, dance with me, I knew from the start I wasn't there.

subtitles.original: 幻だって知るんだよ
subtitles.english: I know it's just an illusion.

subtitles.original: 嘘つきだって知るんだよ
subtitles.english: I know I'm a liar.

subtitles.original: 亡霊だって知るんだよ
subtitles.english: I know I'm a ghost.

subtitles.original: 空白だって知るんだよ
subtitles.english: I know it's just a void.

subtitles.original: どうだっていい言を 嘘って吐いて戻れない
subtitles.english: Spitting out lies about trivial things, I can't go back.

subtitles.original: 時効なんてやってこない 奪ったように奪われて
subtitles.english: Statute of limitations will never come, being taken just as I took.

subtitles.original: 至上主義アドトラック
subtitles.english: Shijou Shugi Ad Truck

subtitles.original: 目合わせ 始まるシナプス 定め
subtitles.english: Eye contact, the synapses begin to fire, fate.

subtitles.original: 麗しき 途端の意思疎通
subtitles.english: Beautiful, immediate mutual understanding.

subtitles.original: 無意味な 賞賛 満足げ 卑近の見本市
subtitles.english: Meaningless praise, looking satisfied, a trade fair of the mundane.

subtitles.original: うつろに 貌 信心 丁重
subtitles.english: Hollowly, face, faith, courtesy.

subtitles.original: 凸凹 すりかざした 詭弁
subtitles.english: Unevenness, brandishing sophistry.

subtitles.original: 着せ替えた 顔持つ 疲れ果て
subtitles.english: Exhausted, having a face that was changed.

subtitles.original: 張り替えられた 皮が ひび割れてゆく
subtitles.english: The replaced skin begins to crack.

subtitles.original: 完膚なきまでに 潰れた この場面 捨てては
subtitles.english: Discarding this place that was completely crushed.

subtitles.original: 刻まれた 皺 すり減らす 底へ
subtitles.english: To the bottom where the carved wrinkles are worn down.

subtitles.original: あぁ 応えを
subtitles.english: Ah, give me an answer.

subtitles.original: 至上主義アドトラックで
subtitles.english: On the supremacy ad truck,

subtitles.original: 四六時中 駆け回る
subtitles.english: running around 24/7.

subtitles.original: 所詮 使い捨ての 消耗品だと
subtitles.english: After all, just a disposable consumable.

subtitles.original: もっと いい気になんなよ
subtitles.english: Don't get too ahead of yourself.

subtitles.original: パッと 打ち上げてやれ 夜を飲み込む 星の花
subtitles.english: Fire it off with a bang, the flower of stars that swallows the night.

subtitles.original: また 重ねられていく 祈り
subtitles.english: Prayers are piled up again,

subtitles.original: 混ぜ放つ
subtitles.english: mixed and released.

subtitles.original: 最高美の 本拠 今日も 騒々
subtitles.english: The base of supreme beauty, today is noisy again.

subtitles.original: 鋭利な 景気 板挟み
subtitles.english: Caught between sharp business conditions.

subtitles.original: 息詰まる 姿で 天上
subtitles.english: A suffocating figure, the heavens,

subtitles.original: 窮地の袋小路
subtitles.english: a dead end in a predicament.

subtitles.original: 雨にも 負けず 風にも負けず
subtitles.english: Unyielding to rain, unyielding to wind.

subtitles.original: 錆びついている 消息 不条理に
subtitles.english: The news is rusted, irrationally.

subtitles.original: 軋みを 増した 歯車は 北風のせいと
subtitles.english: The creaking gears are blamed on the north wind,

subtitles.original: 見限られてゆく
subtitles.english: and are abandoned.

subtitles.original: 変わり映えのない 凡夫の 落涙 晴らしては
subtitles.english: Clearing away the tears of an unremarkable commoner.

subtitles.original: 弾かれた 枠 すり抜ける 古い
subtitles.english: Slipping through the excluded frame, old.

subtitles.original: あぁ 応えは
subtitles.english: Ah, the answer is...

subtitles.original: 至上主義アドトラックで
subtitles.english: On the supremacy ad truck,

subtitles.original: 唯一無二を 吊り下げる
subtitles.english: hanging the one and only.

subtitles.original: 所詮 及ばずの 代用品だと
subtitles.english: After all, just an inadequate substitute.

subtitles.original: おい 今に 見とけよ
subtitles.english: Hey, just you watch.

subtitles.original: パッと 仕掛けて やれば 夜に 靡かれる 星の花
subtitles.english: If I set it off with a bang, the flower of stars swayed by the night.

subtitles.original: また ひとつ 指で 押し開けていく
subtitles.english: Opening up another one with my finger,

subtitles.original: 祈り 横へ すべらせる
subtitles.english: sliding the prayer sideways.

subtitles.original: 閉塞したままの 感情 線 逃れる手は
subtitles.english: The hand to escape the emotional line that remains blocked.

subtitles.original: 鳴らされた 理想 押し退ける 現実
subtitles.english: Reality pushing aside the sounded ideal.

subtitles.original: あぁ 応えを
subtitles.english: Ah, give me an answer.

subtitles.original: 至上主義アドトラックで
subtitles.english: On the supremacy ad truck,

subtitles.original: 四六時中 駆け回る
subtitles.english: running around 24/7.

subtitles.original: 所詮 使い捨ての 消耗品だと
subtitles.english: After all, just a disposable consumable.

subtitles.original: もっと いい気になんなよ
subtitles.english: Don't get too ahead of yourself.

subtitles.original: パッと 打ち上げてやれ 夜を飲み込む 星の花
subtitles.english: Fire it off with a bang, the flower of stars that swallows the night.

subtitles.original: 所詮 及ばずの 代用品だと
subtitles.english: After all, just an inadequate substitute.

subtitles.original: おい 今に 見とけよ
subtitles.english: Hey, just you watch.

subtitles.original: パッと 仕掛けて やれば 夜に たゆとう 星の花
subtitles.english: If I set it off with a bang, the flower of stars drifting in the night.

subtitles.original: また 空に 散りばめられていく 祈り もっと
subtitles.english: Prayers being scattered in the sky once more, even more.
